Roger Federer is a famous man associated with tennis. He is a Swiss professional tennis player who has won a record 20 Grand Slam singles titles and has been ranked No. 1 in the world for a record 310 weeks.

Roger Federer is a famous Swiss professional tennis player who has won a record 20 Grand Slam singles titles and has been ranked world No. 1 in men's singles tennis for a record 310 weeks. He is widely considered to be one of the greatest tennis players of all time.
